ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isline2.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isline2.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isline2.n | |- N = ( Lines ` K ) |
| 4 |  | isline2.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpl1 | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl2 | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> P e. A ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 8 | 7, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl3 | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> Q e. A ) |
| 11 | 7, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( Q e. A -> Q e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> Q e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 1 | #P_latjcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) /\ Q e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( P .\/ Q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 14 | 5, 9, 12, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> ( P .\/ Q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 16 | 7, 15, 2, 4 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( P .\/ Q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( M ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } ) |
| 17 | 5, 14, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> ( M ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } |
| 19 | 15, 1, 2, 3 | #P_islinei | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( P =/= Q /\ { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } ) ) -> { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } e. N ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_mpanr2 | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( P .\/ Q ) } e. N ) |
| 21 | 17, 20 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) /\ P =/= Q ) -> ( M ` ( P .\/ Q ) ) e. N ) |
